snippet.title: Steve Smith signs with Ravens
snippet.description: Steve Smith is eager to continue his National Football League career in Baltimore, where he's just a short flight from his permanent home in Charlotte. snippet.title: Alice Louise Raven
snippet.description: Raven, Alice Louise (Nee Holsen) 1924-2013. Alice Louise (nee Holsen) Raven of Kenosha, WI, died on January 2, 2013, at the age of 88. Alice was born in Manitowoc, WI, on August 4, 1924, the daughter of Clarence and Nora (Jacquette) Holsen. She attended schools in Manitowoc and Two Rivers,

snippet.title: Prosecutors charge 3 in northern Wisconsin slaying
snippet.description: Barron — Investigators say a Rice Lake woman schemed with her boyfriend and another man to kill her ex-husband. snippet.title: Ravens TE Pitta calls 5-year contract 'a blessing'
snippet.description: OWINGS MILLS, Md. (AP) It wasn't long ago when Baltimore Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta wondered if a serious injury would end his NFL career. snippet.title: Preview: Ravens at Cowboys
snippet.description: Baltimore Ravens (9-5) at Dallas Cowboys (9-5) When: 7:15 tonight (NFL Network). Player to watch: Ravens tackle Jared Gaither will be the primary blocker against Cowboys linebacker DeMarcus Ware. Recent history: The Ravens have won the only two meetings.
